html:
threshing. Put by Figure of speechMetonymy (of Cause) for the results of it. Here = my oppressed People. Compare Isaiah 41:15. Micah 4:13. Jeremiah 51:33.

corn of my floor. Literally son of my threshingfloor.

the LORD of hosts. See note on Isaiah 1:9.

the God of Israel. See note on Isaiah 29:23.

God. Hebrew. Elohim. App-4.
